author: James Rogers
title: Coronavirus lockdown results in 30 percent air pollution drop in northeastern US, NASA says
description: NASA satellite data has shown a 30 percent reduction in atmospheric nitrogen dioxide pollution in the northeastern U.S. during the coronavirus lockdown.
content:
